comments.author: sharnoby3@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

When I write an Arabic word (I'm using en-US localization which is default) after writing the first letter in it (in any form in the web) ( especially the first letter) and want to delete it .. It needs pressing "backspace" 2 times as pressing it one time doesn't delete it.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.change keyboard layout to Arabic language
2.write any letter (without any letters before it or a space before it)
3.try to delete it with pressing backspace
Actual Results:  
the letter is not deleted after the first "backspace" press . it needs pressing it 2 times.

Expected Results:  
the letter deleted after the first press of backspace
